p: Use of sterile or incompatible male mosquitoes to reduce the number of the viable eggs and decrease abundance of adult mosquitoes required modification of several model parameters (see methods) each with many potential levels, resulting in hundreds of potential outcomes. To evaluate the general patterns we reported simulations that succeeded in maintaining future bird abundance (PGR â‰¥ 1) and compared those with similar parameters that were not successful. These results are intended to provide a guideline for mosquito release criteria to successfully maintain future bird populations.
